hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Bow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Clear Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Bow#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Hookshot# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.
